Header.title: HODOR
Header.paragraph: HODOR ($HDR), The first token made for HODLERS
subtexts: A holder-oriented token that is helping to fight panic sell across the world.
Land on Mars before Elon Musk with the HODOR.

Tokenomics.title: First week on PancakeSwap
Tokenomics.text: 50% of the original supply will be BURNT

Tokenomics.title: Goal: 60% tax on each transaction
Tokenomics.text: 20% Distributed to HODLERS, 20% added to LIQUIDITY, 20% BURNT

Tokenomics.title: Make HUGE profit from HODLING
Tokenomics.text: We reward HODLERS with a 20% transaction tax which puts $HDR directly in your wallet and 20% more which is burnt everytime someone buys or sells. This will make the price rise to mars in a matter of weeks.

Roadmap.title: April 2021
text: 50% burnt for the first week on Pancake Swap
Improving the website, buy a proprietary domain name
Increase our visibility on social networks
Add the 20% fee for the holder and lower to 40% BURNT

Roadmap.title: June 2021
text: Add the 20% fee for the liquidity
